text.description: SQL type for text fields (e.g., VARCHAR, TEXT)

number.description: SQL type for number fields (e.g., NUMERIC, DECIMAL, INT)

boolean.description: SQL type for boolean fields (e.g., BOOLEAN, BIT)

date.description: SQL type for date fields (e.g., DATE)

datetime.description: SQL type for datetime fields (e.g., TIMESTAMP, DATETIME)

json.description: SQL type for JSON fields (e.g., JSON, JSONB)

uuid.description: SQL type for UUID fields (e.g., UUID, CHAR(36))

binary.description: SQL type for binary fields (e.g., BLOB, BYTEA)
